content: on a holder cast on 2 stitches purl across 33 back stitches cast on 2 stitches place next 24 stitches on a holder for the other sleeve purl across 14 front stitches knit 4 there are now 73 stitches for the body of the sweater on the needle work stockinette stitch on these 73 stitches for 1 to 1-1/4 working an ssk or k2tog at each underarm on the last row work 3 row of garter stitch or k1 p1 ribbing bind off with wrong side facing place one set of sleeve stitches from the holder onto a larger needle needle increasing 1 stitch at each end of the first row work stockinette stitch for 12 row for a 3/4 sleeve to 2 for a full length sleeve or to desired length change to size 5 needles begin 3 row of garter stitch edging on a wrong side row or work edging in k1 p1 ribbing for 3 row bind off work next sleeve in same manner sew sleeve seams note this pattern is written with only one buttonhole at the top but the 2nd and 3rd buttonhole row are noted if knit with size 7 needles the sweater can be knit with no buttonholes as the buttons may be buttoned right through the garter stitch edging 8january 2005 updated june 2013
